table.name: order_release_line
table.description: ORDER_RELEASE_LINE contains the individual line items for an order release. (See also OB_LINE.) For example, if the order base contains: 500 Nike shoes from Philadelphia to N.Y. at the latest by Jan. 1, 2001, the order release may contain a release of 400 Nike shoes by Dec. 1, 2000 and the line item for the order release may contain 400 Nike shoes from Philadelphia to N.Y. and 400 socks from Nashville to N.Y.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base line.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_LINE_XID
columns.description: The XID for the order base line.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_GID
columns.description: A GID created by the system for the order release.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of the item.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the weight.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The weight in base units.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The volume of the item.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The volume in base units.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, or code.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, or code.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, or code.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, or code.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: The declared cost of the item.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The declared value in base units.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The declared value in the base currency.

columns.name: INITIAL_ITEM_GID
columns.description: Can be used to define the substitution.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The packaging unit (considered an inner pack to the packaged item level) for this order release line.

columns.name: ITEM_PACKAGE_COUNT
columns.description: The packaging unit count associated to the packaging unit for this order release line.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The packaged item GID defining the item associated to this order release line.

columns.name: BUY_GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: The general ledger code for the order release line for the buy side (cost).

columns.name: SELL_GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: The general ledger code for the order release line for the sell side (revenue).

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The packaging unit count associated to the packaging unit for this order base line.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit that is to be used when building the order release ship unit. If defined here it will take precedence to the data that is defined on the static packaged item table.

columns.name: NUM_LAYERS_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The number of layers for the transportation handling unit defined here on the order base line. This allows the user to define the TiHi date used to build ship units on the order release per each transactional line passed in, instead of looking to the static TiHi data on the packaged item table.

columns.name: QUANTITY_PER_LAYER
columns.description: The quantity per layer for the transportation handling unit defined here on the order base line. This allows the user to define the TiHi date used to build ship units on the order release per each transactional line passed in, instead of looking to the static TiHi data on the packaged item table.

columns.name: FREE_ALONG_SIDE
columns.description: Refers to the seller's price quote for the goods, including the charge for delivery of the goods alongside a vessel at the named port of export.

columns.name: FREE_ALONG_SIDE_BASE
columns.description: The free alongside in the base currency.

columns.name: FREE_ALONG_SIDE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The free alongside currency GID.

columns.name: IS_HAZARDOUS
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining if the order release line is a hazardous goods. This is a transactional setting instead of looking at the item master definitions.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The commercial invoice GID for the object that is associated with this order release line.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_INVOICE_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: A description field for the commercial invoice.

columns.name: SECONDARY_WEIGHT
columns.description: The order release line can be specified in a secondary weight value for informational purposes.

columns.name: SECONDARY_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The secondary weight unit of measure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The secondary weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_VOLUME
columns.description: The order release line can be specified in a secondary volume value for informational purposes.

columns.name: SECONDARY_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The secondary volume unit of measure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The secondary volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_HAZMAT_GENERIC_GID
columns.description: The hazmat generic GID is the link between a hazardous material and a hazardous item.

columns.name: HAZ_HAZMAT_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The hazmat item GID defines the entry in the hazmat table that contains attributes associated to this order release line.

columns.name: HAZ_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER
columns.description: The hazardous classification ID is the numeric class of the hazardous material as specified by Department of Transportation regulations. Enter the hazard class in this field.

columns.name: HAZ_PROPER_SHIPPING_NAME
columns.description: The hazardous proper shipping name for the hazardous material is similar, but not identical to, the hazardous technical name of the material.

columns.name: HAZ_PACKAGING_GROUP
columns.description: The packaging group denotes the classification of hazardous packaging for this material based on the reportable quantity of the material.

columns.name: HAZ_FLASH_POINT
columns.description: The hazardous flash point for this material is the lowest temperature at which the vapor of the material (if it is a combustible liquid) can be made to ignite momentarily in air. Enter a numeric value if applicable and select K for Kelvin, F for Fahrenheit, or C for Centigrade as the temperature type.

columns.name: HAZ_FLASH_POINT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The hazardous flash point temperature unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_FLASH_POINT_BASE
columns.description: The hazardous flash point temperature in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_EMERGENCY_TEMP
columns.description: The emergency temperature at which the product will begin the process of self-destructing or breaking down.

columns.name: HAZ_EMERGENCY_TEMP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The emergency temperature unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_EMERGENCY_TEMP_BASE
columns.description: The emergency temperature in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_CONTROL_TEMP
columns.description: The hazardous control temperature to report for this order release line.

columns.name: HAZ_CONTROL_TEMP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The hazardous control temperature unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_CONTROL_TEMP_BASE
columns.description: The hazardous control temperature in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_SUBSIDIARY_HAZARD
columns.description: The subsidiary hazard represents a Department of Transportation-specified code pertaining to the cleanup of a spill of a hazardous material.

columns.name: HAZ_INHALATION_HAZARD_ZONE
columns.description: This zone indicates the area of a toxicity hazard based on the concentration of the hazardous material.

columns.name: HAZ_EMERGENCY_RESPONSE_INFO
columns.description: The emergency response information is a number associated with the International Maritime Organization (IMO), which promulgates, encourages, and enforces the highest standards of marine safety in vessel transport. Enter an IMDG emergency response number for this hazardous material.

columns.name: HAZ_NOS_TECHNICAL_NAME
columns.description: The Not Otherwise Specified (NOS) indicator if the material is composed of other chemicals not specified add the technical name.

columns.name: HAZ_NET_EXPLOSV_CONTENT_WEIGHT
columns.description: The hazardous net explosive content weight is the net weight of the explosive contents of the order release line.

columns.name: HAZ_NET_EXPL_CNTNT_WT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The hazardous net explosive content unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_NET_EXPL_CONTENT_WT_BASE
columns.description: The hazardous net explosive content in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZ_MP_TECHNICAL_NAME
columns.description: The marine pollutant technical name for this hazardous substance.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_LIMITED_QUANTITY
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for the limited quantity residual amounts.

columns.name: HAZ_PSA_SINGAPORE_GROUP
columns.description: For the hazardous PSA Singapore Group enter a I, II, OR III. This regulates the cost of hazardous charge/cost at the Singapore destination.

columns.name: HAZ_HAZARDOUS_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: A hazardous description for documentation.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_REPORTABLE_QUANTITY
columns.description: A Y/N indicator, the reportable quantity (RQ) indicator if the material is composed of quantities of other chemicals that are hazardous and must be reported by concentration percentage. RQs are the chemical components of a hazardous item that have reached a threshold in a shipping container that make them reportable as hazardous items.

columns.name: HAZ_RQ_TECHNICAL_NAME
columns.description: The reportable quantity technical name.

columns.name: HAZ_ACTIVITY
columns.description: The hazardous activity field indicates the level of radioactivity of the product.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_TOXIC_INHALATION
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the hazardous toxic inhalation value.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_PASSENGER_AIRCRAFT_FORB
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying the passenger aircraft forbidden indicator if the material cannot be transported on passenger aircraft.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_COMMERCIAL_AIRCRAFT_FOR
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying the commercial aircraft forbidden indicator if the material cannot be transported on passenger aircraft.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_OIL_CONTAINED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that the check hazardous is oil contained field if the material is an oil-based product.

columns.name: HAZ_NOS_TECHNICAL_NAME_2
columns.description: The not otherwise specified (NOS) field if the material is composed of other chemicals not specified add the technical name. You can specify up to 2.

columns.name: HAZ_RQ_TECHNICAL_NAME_2
columns.description: The reportable quantity technical name. You can specify up to 2.

columns.name: HAZ_MP_TECHNICAL_NAME_2
columns.description: The marine pollutant technical name for this hazardous substance. You can specify up to 2.

columns.name: HAZARDOUS_CLASSIFICATION_GID
columns.description: The hazardous classification GID.

columns.name: MANUFACTURED_COUNTRY_CODE_GID
columns.description: The country code GID where this order release line was manufactured.

columns.name: IS_DRAWBACK
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining if this order release line is part of the duty drawback program.

columns.name: BILLED_QUANTITY
columns.description: The billed quantity for order release line goods.

columns.name: BILLED_QUANTITY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The billed quantity unit of measure.

columns.name: BILLED_QUANTITY_UOM_TYPE
columns.description: The billed quantity unit of measure type.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT
columns.description: The price per unit for the order release line to indicate the amount billed.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: The price per unit in the base currency.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The price per unit currency GID.

columns.name: TOTAL_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The total billed amount to the customer for the line. It can contain handling and additional costs beyond goods.

columns.name: TOTAL_BILLED_AMT_BASE
columns.description: The total billed amount in the base currency.

columns.name: TOTAL_BILLED_AMT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The total billed amount currency GID.

columns.name: BRAND_NAME
columns.description: The brand name. For informational purposes.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_NOS
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining this order release line as a hazardous not otherwise specified.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_MARINE_POLLUTANT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining this order as a marine pollutant.

columns.name: HAZ_ERG
columns.description: The ERG (Emergency Response Guide) field. The page number is required for documentation purposes.

columns.name: HAZ_ERG_AIR
columns.description: The ERG (Emergency Response Guide) field for air. The page number is required for documentation purposes.

columns.name: HAZ_EMS
columns.description: The EMS (Emergency aboard Ship) field. The page number is required for documentation.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measurement this unit price is based on.

columns.name: HAZ_COMPATIBILITY_GROUP
columns.description: The hazardous material compatibility group associated to the order release line.

columns.name: PACKAGE_LENGTH
columns.description: The package length for order release line; overrides length on packaged item.

columns.name: PACKAGE_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The package length unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The package length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_WIDTH
columns.description: The package width for order release line; overrides width on packaged item.

columns.name: PACKAGE_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The packaged width unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The packaged width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_HEIGHT
columns.description: The package height for order release line; overrides height on packaged item.

columns.name: PACKAGE_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The package height unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The packaged height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_DIAMETER
columns.description: The package diameter for order release line; overrides diameter on packaged item.

columns.name: PACKAGE_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The package diameter unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: The package diameter in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_CORE_DIAMETER
columns.description: The package core diameter for order release line; overrides core diameter on packaged item. Used for products such as roll of paper that have different dimensions.

columns.name: PACKAGE_CORE_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The package core diameter unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_CORE_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: The package core diameter in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The order base from which this order release line was built.

columns.name: OB_LINE_GID
columns.description: The order base line from which this order release line was built.

columns.name: HAZ_ALL_PACKED
columns.description: Flag to indicate the package is 'All packed in one'.

columns.name: HAZ_AUTHORIZATION
columns.description: The authorization for the dangerous goods shipment. The authorization field is only required to state special governmental authorizations that are required because of the provisions or packing materials shipped with.

columns.name: HAZ_CHEMICAL_FORMULA
columns.description: The basic chemical description of the substance.

columns.name: HAZ_CONCENTRATION_PERCENT
columns.description: Required if the dangerous goods UN number is 2031, 1796, 1826, or 1873. Enter the percentage of dangerous goods concentration if the above condition applies.

columns.name: HAZ_CRIT_SAFETY_INDEX
columns.description: A measurement for packages containing fissile material that is determined by dividing the number 50 by the smaller of the numbers determined using the rules in section 10.6.2.4.3 of the IATA Dangerous Goods Regulation Guide.

columns.name: HAZ_APPROVAL_EXEMPTION_GID
columns.description: The hazardous approval exemption GID.

columns.name: HAZ_IDG_ADD_DESC_INFO
columns.description: The hazmat IDG additional description information.

columns.name: HAZ_MAX_QUANTITY
columns.description: The maximum passenger volume or the maximum cargo volume for the item. Used in Q- Value calculation.

columns.name: HAZ_OUTER_PACKAGING_TYPE
columns.description: Outer packaging type if packing type = All packed in one.

columns.name: HAZ_OUTER_PACKING_COUNT
columns.description: The outer packing count.

columns.name: HAZ_IS_OVERPACK
columns.description: Flag to indicate the package is an 'overpack'.

columns.name: HAZ_PACKAGE_TYPE
columns.description: The hazmat package type of the dangerous goods shipment.

columns.name: HAZ_PACKING_COUNT
columns.description: The packing count (number of packaged units).

columns.name: HAZ_PACKING_INSTRUCTIONS
columns.description: Required for dangerous goods shipments, unless the dangerous goods class is radioactive or not restricted. See Table 4.2 columns G, I, or K of the IATA Dangerous Goods Regulation Guide.

columns.name: HAZ_PHYSICAL_FORM
columns.description: A description of the physical form of the radioactive substance: S(p)ecial, (S)olid, (L)iquid, (G)as.

columns.name: HAZ_Q_VALUE
columns.description: The ratio used to indicate that the combined quantities in 'all packed in one' package are within the maximum allowable limits.

columns.name: HAZ_QUANTITY
columns.description: The hazmat item quantity.

columns.name: HAZ_RADIOACTIVE_LABEL
columns.description: The type of label on the shipment. W1 (White I), Y2 (Yellow II), Y3 (Yellow III).

columns.name: HAZ_RAD_PACKAGING
columns.description: A description of the type of packaging the substance is contained in. Acceptable package types are listed in section 10.5 of the dangerous goods regulations guide: Expected (Expected), Industrial ip1 (Industrial Type 1(IP-1)), Industrial ip2 (Industrial Type 2(IP-2)), Industrial ip3 (Industrial Type 3(IP-3)), Type a (Type A), Type b(m) ( Type B(M)), Type b(u) ( Type B(U)), Type c ( Type C ).

columns.name: HAZ_RADIOACTIVITY
columns.description: A measurement of the activity of the shipment. For fissile material, the weight of the material in grams or kilograms may be substituted for the activity measurement.

columns.name: HAZ_RADIOACTIVITY_UNITS
columns.description: The units that the activity were measured in. This must be in Becquerel units (or multiples thereof): Bq (Becquerel), kBq (kilobecquerel), MBq (megabecquerel), GBq (gigabecquerel), TBq (terabecquerel), PBq (petabecquerel).

columns.name: HAZ_RADIONUCLIDE
columns.description: The radionuclide assigned to the substance being shipped. A table of basic radionuclides is available in the IATA Dangerous Goods Regulation Guide section 10.4.A.  For example, aluminum (13) has a radionuclide Al-26.

columns.name: HAZ_SPECIAL_PROVISIONS
columns.description: Indicates dangerous goods (DG) are being shipped under one of the special provisions listed in the IATA Dangerous Goods Regulation Guide, section 4.4.  There appear to be 146 different provisions, and multiple provisions may apply to a single item in some cases.

columns.name: HAZ_SUBSTANCE_NUMBER
columns.description: The hazardous materials substance number.

columns.name: HAZ_SURFACE_READING
columns.description: The surface reading of the radiation exposure for the package. This reading must be measured in mrem/h.

columns.name: HAZ_TRANSPORT_INDEX
columns.description: A number based on the radiation exposure of a package. This is determined based on the maximum measurement of the radiation in mrem/h at a distance of 1 meter from the package surface.

columns.name: HAZ_TYPE
columns.description: The hazardous materials type. Valid values are: l = Limited Quantities, e = 500 KG Exemption, f = Fully Regulated (Purolater).

columns.name: HAZ_UNITS
columns.description: IATA units for non UPS shipments (L=>Liters g=>Grams kg=>Kilograms kg G=>Kilograms Gross).

columns.name: HAZ_EXT_CODE
columns.description: The item hazmat code as configured in the TNT EM. (For carrier TNT).

columns.name: THU_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit profile (list of valid THUs for this order line) that is to be used when building the order release ship unit. If defined here it will take precedence to the data that is defined on the static packaged item table.

columns.name: OB_LINE_REL_INSTR_SEQ
columns.description: The order base line release instruction sequence number, carried over from column OB_RELEASE_INSTRUCTION_SEQ in table OB_RELEASE_INSTRUCTION when the order release line is created from an order base line.

columns.name: IS_SPLIT_ALLOWED
columns.description: Indicates if the order release ship units that are created can be split into multiple pieces of equipment.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE1
columns.description: Attribute fields (flexfields) allow you to add additional information about an object. Data Type VARCHAR2 (150)
